text: hananim-eun mose-ui eomiege gyesihayeo geuege jeoj-eul meog-idolog ha go man-il geuui sinbyeon-e dulyeoum-eul neukkilttaeneun geuleul gangmullo deonjidoe dulyeo wohaji malgo seulpeohajido malla geu bun-eun geuleul neoegelo dollyeo jul geos-imyeo geuleul seonjija gaunde hanalo mandeul geos-ila
